sub_title: Co-author of the book 'Speel je mee in Li La Land?' for primary education. Passionate creator, igniter and explorer.
summary:
CURRENTLY:
Working at Li La Land, creating innovative products to support, inspire and challenge young children to explore the world around them. Co-authored the book 'Speel je mee in Li La Land'​ together with the amazing Irma Smegen, describing 50 detailed activities combining Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Math (STEAM) with language and socio-emotional development. In addition the book provides a strong theoretical basis for a comprehensive and most importantly practical approach to primary education that is truly in tune with the development of a child's young brain and mind. 

WHAT I BRING:
Thinking on how to describe my natural role within a group I came up with the word ‘Vonkeling’. Although it doesn’t exist in Dutch, I derived the word from ‘vonk’, meaning spark, making a Vonkeling ‘someone who sparks’. These sparks can be anything from new ideas and concepts, perspectives or insights, depending on what the situation asks for. Being an artist I’m able to compose stories with words or visuals that spark connections between the people involved. After all, data points and abstractly formulated values have never motivated people, but well-presented stories can push us to move mountains. This makes me a strong brainstormer and concept developer who can also bring different people together to make ideas become reality. My enthusiasm has been characterised as being 'contagious'​ and I love igniting other people's passions to strive for our shared goals.

Marleen Vente

education.field_of_study: International Relations; Conflict Studies, Human Rights

projects.title: The creative job hunt of a Vonkeling
projects.description: Being a passionate creator, igniter and explorer I'm currently looking for a fulfilling job. I document my adventures from this creative job hunt on http://www.vonkeling.nl  It's one big experiment and I have no idea where it'll lead me. And that's okay. In fact, so far it has turned out to be lots of fun!

contributors.headline: Co-author of the book 'Speel je mee in Li La Land?' for primary education. Passionate creator, igniter and explorer.

projects.title: Prompting Questions
projects.description:
Artfully hand drawn question cards designed to spark meaningful conversations.

Great for use in a professional context, as part of your coaching practice, training or workshop; or use them in a social setting with friends and family. Sold per set of 20 A5 sized laminated cards, each with a different Prompting Question, plus one card with instructions.

contributors.headline: Co-author of the book 'Speel je mee in Li La Land?' for primary education. Passionate creator, igniter and explorer.

projects.title: Co-author of the book 'Speel je mee in Li La Land', 50 activities and a new vision for primary education
projects.description:
Kinderen hebben van nature een onderzoekende houding. Ze willen de wereld om zich heen verkennen en leren begrijpen. Speel je mee in Li La Land? stimuleert die behoefte om te ontdekken met 50 verrassende activiteiten.

Via poppenspel belanden kinderen in een fantasievol avontuur waarna ze zelf iets gaan ontwerpen of op onderzoek uitgaan. Ze spelen samen met Slang in de pindakaasfabriek, ontwikkelen een takelconstructie om Vogel in een boom te hijsen en bouwen met Uil een raket om de ruimte in te schieten. Kinderen verkennen zo hun mogelijkheden en breiden deze spelenderwijs uit.

Speel je mee in Li La Land? biedt creatieve uitdagingen op het gebied van
• wetenschap & technologie
• rekenen & taal
• natuur & milieu
• kunst & cultuur
en verbindt op een vanzelfsprekende manier alle leer- en ontwikkelgebieden met elkaar; wij denken in Li La Land graag búiten de (school)vakjes.

profile_positions.title: Vonkeling

profile_positions.description: Teamlid creative sessies voor onder andere Amnestie International en de Dierenbescherming.
profile_positions.title: Creatieve Kop

profile_positions.description:
Vonkeling helps people and organizations find and shape their story.
Want to celebrate a new chapter like a marriage, moving to a new home or a different country, retirement, launching a new product or starting your own company? What 'shape' fits you and your story? An event, a game, a trip or a website? Together with Vonkeling you'll shape your story to be worthy of you!
Vonkeling is located in the Hague, the Netherlands.

NL: Vonkeling inspireert en creëert voor mensen en bedrijven bij het vinden en vormen van hun verhaal.
Wil je een nieuw hoofdstuk vieren zoals je huwelijk, een nieuw huis, emigratie, pensioen, de lancering van een nieuw product of het starten van je eigen bedrijf? Welke 'vorm' past het beste bij je verhaal; een event, een reis, een spel of een website? ‘Iets speciaals’ is pas af als het echt bij je past, ‘iets speciaal van jou‘ is. Vonkeling helpt je om dat op een schitterende manier te realiseren.

profile_positions.title: Founder and owner

profile_positions.description: This position was not only new to iFactors, but a novelty to all Apple Premium Resellers in the Netherlands. During this time I was responsible for building the department from the ground up. This included amongst other things: policy proposals, training courses, course materials, course organization and planning and evaluation processes.
profile_positions.title: Corporate trainer

profile_positions.description:
A research intern at 'Solution Analysis' (part of the Research Department), working mainly on sustainability in the tropical fruit industry

This research internship also provided me with the case study for my bachelor thesis for the University of Utrecht on corporate self-regulation of sustainable supply chains in the agro-food industry.
profile_positions.title: Project Assistent Solution Analysis

profile_positions.description:
The Hague branch (11/2006-04/2008)
Starting out as Sales, was asked henceforth to replace our store manager during his days off, vacation, etc. I enjoyed making sure things were going well for the store and our sales team.

Zoetermeer branch (09/2007-04/2008)
When the company opened a new store, I was asked to replace the new store manager for his days off as well, and to help getting the new store going.
profile_positions.title: Substitute Store Manager
